column5: Your chance to own a piece of history!!!  http://www.cabelas.com/cabelas/en/template...rset=ISO-8859-1
Hell for $700 I'll take two Glen !

Yup, buck has had a couple of really nice knives put out for collectors. It would make something neat to display no doubt, too bad I don't have 700$ USD burning a hole in my pocket. Thanks for sharing GCD, had yet to see this one
It hard to tell from a pic but the guard on the handle turns me off.  It looks too big on a knife with a blade of that size.
Whats the knuckle gaurd for????????????? More fit for Rambo. Now thats an American for ya.LOL
Dang, that's a nasty lookin weapon Glen and could do some serious damage to a person, no matter which way it was swung at him.
It's an old WW1 "Doughboy" trench warfare knife, military issue.
Check these Bad Boys out..  http://relentlessknives.com/catalog.html
I kind of thought it was a Bayonet, but the knuckle Rings and the lack of Barrel clips, tells me its a Pre Rambo knife.  Was it ever GI issued?
Now ...that's a knife (knives)! Wonder why they call some of them neckers? And, why they are so wide at the blade?
Holly crap ola HF I was doing some reseach on yer question,and got hit with two trojans. military sites to boot,
misfish... if you're getting hit with trojans you're going to the wrong bars me lad....
